additional_info:
Fenced, Fruits, Communications: electricity, gas, Water 
 Plot of land in Giorgitsminda village for sale. Grigortsminda is a village neighboring Tbilisi’s 7th Micro-rayon in Gldani district, 5 minute ride from subway station Akhmeteli. The land is located on a hill with a nice view over Tbilisi and surrounding mountains. The lot is very green and has plenty of fruit trees. There is a small (51 m2) house standing on the territory. All utilities (gas, water and electricity) are connected, but the very house needs serious refurbishment. The place is suitable both as a summer house spot and a site for a house outside the city.
